item.title: How Italy's banking M&A wave started crashing
item.description: The merger fever that's gripped Italy's banking sector showed signs of abating this summer — but its end isn't nigh.

item.title: Affirm's stock soars 15% on earnings, revenue beat
item.description: Affirm's earnings per share of 20 cents for the quarter was almost double what Wall Street expected.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves after hours: Ulta Beauty, Dell Technologies, Gap, Autodesk and more
item.description: These are some of the stocks posting the largest moves in extended hours trading.

item.title: Lisa Cook hints 'clerical error' to blame for any mortgage application discrepancy
item.description: The document calls the fraud allegation "unsubstantiated and unproven" but does not go into detail about why that is the case.

item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in premarket trading.
